articles.description: Another ransomware operation known as 'Black Kingdom' is exploiting the Microsoft Exchange Server ProxyLogon vulnerabilities to encrypt servers.
articles.content:
Another ransomware operation known as 'Black Kingdom' is exploiting the Microsoft Exchange Server ProxyLogon vulnerabilities to encrypt servers.

articles.title: Anker’s new MagSafe Charger returns to all-time low of $16 in latest sale, more from $11 - 9to5Toys
